title: Soniclear Lush Cashmere Brush Head by Michael Todd Beauty
description:
LUSH CASHMERE FACE BRUSH
Luxurious Gentle Cleanse

The Lush Cashmere Brush is a plush facial cleansing brush with longer extra soft cashmere-like bristles for an extra gentle yet thorough facial cleansing. Can also be used for applying moisturizer and serum. For all skin types and especially delicate and fragile skin  prone to irritation and dehydration. Very dry, blemished and extra sensitive skin types as well as young children (10 and up) will love using this brush.

Soniclear brushes are the world's first antimicrobial sonic skin cleansing brushes to guard against stain and odor causing bacteria. Brush Head compatible with all Soniclear facial cleansing devices except Soniclear Classic.

To learn more, please visit: http://www.michaeltoddbeauty.com/lush-cashmere-brush-head.html

transcripts: do you have sensitive skin have you always wanted to join in on the sonic skin cleansing revolution that thought that maybe the brushes were a little too aggressive for your skin well Michael Todd the makers of the Soniclear have created a brush head that allows even sensitive skin to join in the benefits of sonic skin cleansing will the lunch cashmere brush head far clear is one of the world's first antimicrobial sonic skin cleansing systems with antimicrobial protected brush heads these brush heads guard against 99% of the stain and odor causing bacteria that can grow in these brushes between use. Enjoy the same antimicrobial protection that is built into Soniclear standard antimicrobial face and body brush now available in the lush cashmere brush head for sensitive skin. You are going to love the super soft lush cashmere like brush bristles it gently sweep across the skin surface here in dead skin cells make up and residue. Each brush bristle is perfectly built for tip prevent scratching and with gentle sonic motion won't pull and tug at the skin. Plus the lush cashmere brush head has an approximate six-month recommended replacement which is standard for all of Michael Todd's antimicrobial cleansing brush heads keep in mind with the lush chasmere brush head doesn't spin like a rotary flash instead the brush bristles move sonically back and forth like micro grooms you may not see the Bristol action, but you certainly will feel it working. Congratulations on joining the sonic skin cleansing revolution and have fun with the Soniclear by Michael Todd.
